snippet.title: Frontier Paladin - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Play a Paladin Apprentice on his first quest as he enters a cursed old battlefield to recover long lost divine relics in this souls-lite meets tower defense game. Join developer Singular Scheme for a deep dive into the gameplay of Frontier Paladin, including combat, how to use fortifications and traps to your advantage, defense, and more.
